strategy: Adopt a time-dependent adaptive strategy where the row player adjusts the probability of choosing "Go to Movie" based on the lagged choices of the column player over the past 3 rounds. If the column player chose "Go to Movie" in the last two rounds, increase the probability of choosing "Go to Movie" to 70%. Otherwise, default to a 50% chance. This leverages behavioral momentum and anticipates coordination patterns, exploiting potential consistency in the column player’s preferences.
